name: Save the Village
description:
Be a dancer who needs to save your village from an attack of dancing Orcs, dance with them and throw them out for the people's safety.

W and D - Movement

Space - Jump

Touch an Orc and Jump to Dance (Be insistent ;D)

Stay closer to the Jukebox for healing and increase your spin power.

Made with bits and pieces from the following Kenney Assets:

  • Castle Kit
  • Nature Pack Extended
  • Medieval Town (base)
  • 3D Characters
  • UI Pack: RPG Expansion
  • Kenney Fonts
  • Game Icons

Created by Scroplus.

Made by: Nilton Calegari and Thomas A. de Souza
